data.name: Save me Mr Tako Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Here is the official Original Soundtrack of Christophe Galati's game "Save Me Mr. Tako" published by Limited Run on Nintendo Switch and Steam. 112 tracks composed by Marc-Antoine Archier with the Deflemask Tracker.
data.about_the_game: Here is the official Original Soundtrack of Christophe Galati's game "Save Me Mr. Tako" published by Limited Run on Nintendo Switch and Steam. 112 tracks composed by Marc-Antoine Archier with the Deflemask Tracker.
data.short_description: Here is the official Original Soundtrack of Christophe Galati's game "Save Me Mr. Tako" published by Limited Run on Nintendo Switch and Steam. 112 tracks composed by Marc-Antoine Archier with the Deflemask Tracker.
